类 Ground

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground

直接已知子类:
Bonfire, Cemetery, Crater, Dirt, Floor, Floor, Floor, LockedDoor, Tree, Valley, Vendor, Wall, Wall
public abstract class Ground
extends java.lang.Object
implements Capable, Printable, DesignOSoulsAddOn
Class representing terrain type

    • getDisplayChar

      public char getDisplayChar()
      指定者:
      getDisplayChar 在接口中 Printable

    • allowableActions

      public Actions allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
      Returns an empty Action list.
      参数:
      actor - the Actor acting
      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor
      返回:
      a new, empty collection of Actions

    • canActorEnter

      public boolean canActorEnter​(Actor actor)
      Override this to implement impassable terrain, or terrain that is only passable if conditions are met.
      参数:
      actor - the Actor to check
      返回:
      true

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Ground can also experience the joy of time.
      参数:
      location - The location of the Ground

    • blocksThrownObjects

      public boolean blocksThrownObjects()
      Override this to implement terrain that blocks thrown objects but not movement, or vice versa
      返回:
      true

    • hasCapability

      public boolean hasCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Check whether this Ground type has the given Capability.
      指定者:
      hasCapability 在接口中 Capable
      参数:
      capability - the Capability to check
      返回:
      true if and only if this Ground has the given capability.
